executive_synthesis.title: Technical Feature Integration Observation Report
executive_synthesis.observation_window: 2026-01-07 (3 consecutive FINN cycles with technical indicators)
executive_synthesis.question_posed: When FINN gains technical vision (RSI, MACD, Bollinger), does epistemic behavior change?

finding_A.question: Does FINN successfully see technical indicators?
finding_A.observation: YES - technical_available shifted from FALSE (Phase 1) to TRUE (100% Phase 2 cycles). Indicator Bridge successfully populated 599,529 rows.

finding_B.question: Does FINN actively use technical data in reasoning?
finding_B.observation: YES - technical_used=TRUE across all 3 cycles. FINN explicitly cites RSI overbought conditions in key_observations and risk_factors.

finding_C.question: Does adding technical data change confidence calibration?
finding_C.observation: SLIGHT REDUCTION - Phase 1 confidence was locked at 0.75. Phase 2 confidence dropped to 0.72 in cycles 1-2 (citing overbought crypto RSI), recovering to 0.75 in cycle 3. Average 0.73.

finding_D.question: Does regime stability change with technical features?
finding_D.observation: NO CHANGE - Regime remained BULL across all 3 cycles, consistent with Phase 1. Fragility locked at 0.35.

finding_E.question: Does FINN identify technical risk factors?
finding_E.observation: YES - All 3 cycles cite 'overbought RSI conditions' (BTC 68.4, ETH 68.4, AVAX 74.2, CHZ 82.9) as risk factors. FINN also notes 'limited technical data depth' (no ADX/volatility_regime) - correctly identifying OUT OF SCOPE fields.

technical_usage.delta: FALSE -> TRUE (FINN actively incorporating indicators into reasoning)

technical_feature_set.delta: RSI, MACD, Bollinger Bands, SMA now available

driver_claim.delta: NO CHANGE (macro liquidity remains primary driver)

cycle_1.notable: First cycle with technical vision - confidence reduced from 0.75 to 0.72

cycle_2.notable: Confidence stable at 0.72, consistent RSI citations

cycle_3.notable: Confidence recovered to 0.75, technical integration stable

cycle_summary.consistency: 100% - technical_available, technical_used, regime, fragility, driver identical across all 3 cycles

risk_factor_emergence.observation: FINN now cites RSI overbought conditions as risk factors
examples: Multiple crypto assets showing overbought RSI conditions (BTC: 68.4, ETH: 68.4, AVAX: 74.2, CHZ: 82.9)
EURSEK RSI at extreme oversold 20.00, indicating potential FX stress

self_awareness_of_gaps.observation: FINN correctly identifies missing technical depth
examples: Limited technical signal completeness (no ADX, volatility_regime, or composite_signal data)
Limited technical data depth (only RSI and MACD, no ADX or volatility regimes)

confidence_modulation.observation: Confidence dropped 0.72 when technical showed overbought, recovered to 0.75
confidence_modulation.implication_noted: Technical data appears to introduce nuance into confidence calibration

ceo_closing_statement_reflection: We did not add indicators to force FINN to trade. We added indicators to see whether FINN would notice risk. It noticed.
